resources.string: Aql-ak deg tɣimit n usfaylu uslig

%1$s iseffeḍ azray-ik n unadi d tunigin mi ara teffɣeḍ seg usnas neɣ ad tmedleḍ iccaren n tunigin tusligin. Ɣas wama aya ur yettarra ara d udrig deg yismal web neɣ deg usaǧǧaw-ik n unekcum Internet, aya ad k-yeǧǧ ad tḥerzeḍ tabaḍnit n urmud-ik srid i wid yesseqdacen ibenk-ik.
Tiktiwin tigejdanin yuzzlen ur nṣeḥḥi ara
Rnu anegzum akken ad teldiḍ iccaren usligen seg ugdil agejdan.
Sireg isumar n unadi deg yisfuyla n tunigin tusligin?
%s ad yazen sekra n wayen i tettaruḍ deg ufeggag n tansiwin ɣer umsedday-inek n unadi s wudem amezwer.
Mtawi ticraḍ n yisebtar, azray, awalen uffiren, akked waṭas-nniḍen s umiḍan n Firefox
Ales tuqqna akken ad ikemmel umtawi
Sken isumar n tkatut ɣef afus
Isem n yibenk ur yezmir ara ad yili d ilem.
Ilɣa n yiccaren yettwaremsen seg Firefox ɣef yibenlan-nniḍen.
Sewḥel agbur akked iskripten i k-yeṭṭafaṛen srid
Ammesten mgal aḍfaṛ yensa i yismal-a web
Tisuraf ad k-ǧǧent ad tsenseḍ aùùesten mgal aḍfaṛ i kra n yismal.
Yensa s wudem amatu, ddu ɣer yiɣewwaren akken ad yermed.
Ad yebḍu isefka ɣef timellit, aseqdec, arrum d wudem n yiminig-ik i Mozilla akken ad aɣ-d-yefk afus i usnerni n %1$s
Ad yeǧǧ Mozilla ad tesbedd daɣen ad telqeḍ isefka n tmahilin tirmitanin
Suref-aɣ. %1$s ur izmir ara ad isali asebter-nni.
Azen aneqqis n uɣelluy i Mozilla
Ur yizmir ara ad ibḍu ɣer usnas-a
Issin ugar γef tuzba n iccaren…
Kkes isefka n tunigin mi ara tefɣeḍ
